website_summaries.verdict: An excellent set by a top name in the game. For those serious about pitching horseshoes, this set is a good choice for recreation to competitive-level play.
pros: A top-seller by St. Pierre for all it has to offer for horseshoe pitching enthusiasts, including forged steel shoes with remarkable weight and balance
Colors are easy to distinguish between players and find on grass and other surfaces
cons: Stakes are durable but not long enough for some players' needs
Plastic storage case has the tendency to crack easily

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I'm a grandma. We had horseshoes when I was a kid and I got crazy in my old age and bought myself HORSESHOES. Yes I did. I've gotten about 40 points since October (2 whole ringers). I love it! I'll take on any of you.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is forged, not cast iron. Has that beautiful ring to it. Threw the shoes several times hitting the steal pin - just paint marks on the pin, no cracks or breaks on the shoes. Definitely would recommend. The rigid plastic carrying case should last quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Jarek Otremba

customer_reviews.title: The horse shoes themselves are well mad and durable. ...
customer_reviews.text: The horse shoes themselves are well mad and durable. The reason i give 4 stars instead of 5 is the stakes are too short. I went to Home Dept and bought some 36" re-bat stakes for $5.47 each and pounded them 20 inches in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, Repeat buyer...
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to give this a 5 star as the actual horseshoes themselves are great quality, great shoes...I have bought two sets (4 each), the first set many years ago, that are just fine to still use (you do have to re-paint them every once in a while), and the second set, just because I throw more often now and needed a second set...The case is pretty slick to carry them....I never used the pegs as I have my own, but if you plan on using them, know that they are too short...
customer_reviews.author: Duane A. Pierson

customer_reviews.title: still feels like they could have done better
customer_reviews.text: the two dies weren't totally matched up in the forging process... there's noticeable mismatch from one side to the other. they did an OK job grinding the edge out and blending the two halves, it's not sharp, but ... still feels like they could have done better. the shoes all have a different feel in the hand because of the varying edge geometries.
customer_reviews.author: just another engineer

customer_reviews.title: Stakes are too short. Don't buy this set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set but wish I had not. The horseshoe stakes are only 24 inches long. According to horseshoe rules the stake must be 14 inches above the ground. The stakes are only 24 inches long. The instructions that come with it tell you to plant them 6 inches in the ground. How long do you think they would stay in the ground after being constantly hit by horseshoes? Ridiculous! Spend the money and buy a set with stakes that are 3 feet long so that they stay in place. Don't buy this set
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cionti

customer_reviews.title: Case is JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: When you spend this much on a self acclaimed "professional" rated horseshoe set, I would expect the case they come in to hold securely and be well constructed. The case is JUNK plastic that is a puzzle to get the horseshoes back into it for storing. The case I saw at Walmart of a much cheaper set of horseshoes at least was not garbage like this. You can even get the case closed and the tabs to snap it shut are a piece of crap. I am EXTREMELY disappointed with the set already and I just received it today!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite Durable
customer_reviews.text: We need these every year for our family reunion tournament. We've had horrible luck with what we've bought at the local discount store (the one that's world wide now). They always broke at least one set during the game. Not true with these, however. They withstood hours of use without chipping, cracking, or otherwise breaking.
customer_reviews.author: CodingChris

customer_reviews.title: We're enjoying our St. Piere Pro horseshoe set
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up; fun to play. I was a bit worried about whether or not my 8 year-old twin grandsons could throw the pro-weight horseshoes. No problem, though, for now, we're just practicing and we have not yet tried throwing the regulation distance. As we improve our skills, we'll try longer distances, foot by foot, 'til we're all able to throw ringers at the regulation distance.
customer_reviews.author: SoozE

customer_reviews.title: How’s your throw game?
customer_reviews.text: Husband needed a new horse shoe set for the season. Ordered these and he was very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Good quality family shoes with nice weight
customer_reviews.text: Good quality family shoes with nice weight. As in all sets, the posts, even though they are also good quality steel, are WAY too short to be driven in enough for stability and still have the requisite 13-14 inches protruding above ground. Oh - and the box they come in is complete junk plastic - but didn't need that anyway.
customer_reviews.author: good or not

customer_reviews.title: A ringer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made set, which fits snugly into the enclosed carrying case. We’ve been enjoying in the yard, and look forward to carrying it to cookouts or outdoor gatherings. It was a wonderful gift for my boyfriend, and the set appears rugged.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: Minor imperfections on the horseshoes
customer_reviews.text: One horseshoe arrived with some imperfections in the shape and what appeared to be some mild rust where paint was missing. Overall though even with those minor hiccups; I would recommend if you have the 40 foot space for "regulation" horseshoe pits it is worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I've seen is durability - the coating on the horseshoes will quickly chip away, leaving sharp edges that can cut hands. Understanding that they're horseshoes and they're going to get beat up, I think they could've done a better job with the coating. Overall however a good starter set for enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.author: Tmil

customer_reviews.title: Manly Gifts!!!
customer_reviews.text: Immediately my elementary school niece beat everyone in the home in this game. I brought this for the hubby Man Cave and he loved it. My children decided that instead of clothing, their father needed “Manly Gifts.”
customer_reviews.author: Desi

customer_reviews.title: Great Horseshoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are well-made horseshoes and certainly seem very durable and should last for many years to come. I built horseshoe pits according to regulation standards in our backyard next to our new patio and landscaping.
customer_reviews.author: TCRay

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set of horseshoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of horseshoes for the price.The paint on them chips when hitting rocks or other horseshoes when I use them out camping but you would expect that to happen. Only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is they should have a better carrying case.It's just cheap plastic and will break sooner than later.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Mullen

customer_reviews.title: great shoes for a great price
customer_reviews.text: seller got it to me very fast! and the shoes are perfect. as someone had stated in a previous review you can use these shoes if you're feeling ambitious and want to enter a tournament! great shoes for a great price I play 3-4 times a week in my back yard and have had no issues.. some of my friends have thrown them and they've rebounded into cinder blocks and the shoes are still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Annerz16

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased over 10 sets of these shoes so all of our local organizations that we throw at have the same shoes and everyone
customer_reviews.text: This set of horseshoes is just about the closes you are going to get for balance ,weight and flipping to the real deal without paying a lot. I have purchased over 10 sets of these shoes so all of our local organizations that we throw at have the same shoes and everyone is happy with the shoes. The only bad thing about the shoe is you do not want to throw it into a rebar stake because it will leave burrs on the shoe. Throwing on a straight, smooth stake, This shoes performs awesome, and will last year after year.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: Good horseshoe set for good price,
customer_reviews.text: Real good professional horse shoe set. Should last a long time. My friends can believe how good of a set this is. The steel stakes are really good. Should be good. They use well in my new horseshoe pit. Price made sense for the quality of good horseshoes.
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: Steel horseshoes with durable coding
customer_reviews.text: Well made steel horseshoes with durable coding. Horseshoes were bought for a gift. They were scratched up and pretty damaged. I know they are meant to get beat up but didn’t want to give as a gift. Contacted the seller who was quick to solve the issue. Good customer service makes for a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Horseshoe Set
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a well made, quality horseshoe set. We have used it several times so far and I have even run over one of the stakes accidently on the ATV and they seem to be substantial and hold up to anything! I expect to have many good years from this set. Instructions for game play are easy to understand even if you've never played horseshoes before.
customer_reviews.author: SavvvyShopper

customer_reviews.title: very nice set
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use the poles as we were playing with the shoes at a park, the shoes are very nicely made, good quality and seem to be the right weight.
customer_reviews.author: Noctane

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase ,fast came as described, I bought two sets and glad I did!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Quality from what I can tell
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of knowledge of horseshoes but I got this as a gift for my dad and everything seems to be made nicely. He uses them to practice for the new horseshoe league he joined at the senior center. If your dad is also in a horseshoe league at the senior center I recommend not getting these so my dad has a better chance of beating your dad.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Keep the horse shoes and throw everything else away
customer_reviews.text: Nice horse shoes but the storage case is garbage - don't buy it for the case. The stakes are also crude and short. In sandy or loose soil they are not long enough to stand up. I replaced them with galvi water pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality with precise instructions. The manual could use some editing. When I installed the stakes it became clear that they are two inches too short to meet the specifications in the instructions. I compensated by subtracting 1 inch from the tap depth into the buried beam and 1 inch from the sand depth. After a month, the paint is chipping but everything else is rock solid.
customer_reviews.author: Friel

customer_reviews.title: stakes are way too short, shoes are good
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay upright in normal soil, unless you aren't ever hitting them ;)
customer_reviews.author: Rosemount MN Family

customer_reviews.title: but you cant really find any good ones with them that arent rediculously expensive
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with longer poles, but you cant really find any good ones with them that arent rediculously expensive. But if you really want them in the ground just buy a bag of concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad set. Stakes need to be longer. The stakes had to be reset alot cause not long enough to get a solid grip in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: The real deal - worth the expense if you want real horse shoes that will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: So solid. Real weight and great design. These will last a lifetime. They are so heavy you can mess up your manicured lawn and I won't let my younger children toss them because they will break something or someone. Looked a long time for great horseshoes and I am very satisfied with these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set, well built and durable Yes the colour will peel after some beatings but you can repaint.
customer_reviews.author: Alondra

customer_reviews.title: Quality built.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built. Solid construction. Typical installation for stakes. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Fun for those ages 10 and up!
customer_reviews.text: Made of Forged Steel. Very heavy weight. We have found these to be a fun family activity!
customer_reviews.author: Tina R ONeal

customer_reviews.title: Good set to own
customer_reviews.text: while these are forged and not cast I was a bit surprised when they chipped just a little bit upon first use. No bother...at least they didn't break like other horseshoe sets which are not made in the U.S.A. The horseshoes are weighted properly and the stakes are easy to hammer into the ground at the park and then easier to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: Stakes bend with use and hard case flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are fine but the stakes are abnormally thin and they bend with use. Hard plastic case is flimsy and very difficult to close after first use.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, need longer stakes
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality shoes, fun to play, and I'm sure they'll last forever, but wish stakes were longer. They can't really go deep enough to keep them from moving every time they get hit, so were constantly straightening them out.
customer_reviews.author: SarahB

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for all groups!
customer_reviews.text: My older brother wanted to setup a horse shoe area for himself and friends. I went onto the internet looked around then hit Amazon. Bingo, a super set for a very fair price, case included. This set is also made right here in the good old USA. These are an all around tuff set that we would recommend to anyone looking for a sturdy, well made set.
customer_reviews.author: ginny p

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Good quality and a nice case to keep them in. The only thing I would recommend is to include instructions on how to get everything back in the case! The guys who took them out, weren’t able to repack them. I figured it out though after about 10 minutes without having seen them in the case before hand. 😉 Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: DGM

customer_reviews.title: very nice!
customer_reviews.text: We got these for my in-laws. They just bought a house with a horse shoe area/court thing and no horse shoes! We got these for them for Christmas. They seem heavy duty and great quality! I love that they are made in America! We haven't actually used them yet so I may need to update this review after we use them this summer.
customer_reviews.author: MaliS

customer_reviews.title: Great but the posts could be a little longer!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome & heavy duty. The posts are slightly short, so they're a bit iffy to set in concrete. I set mine in concrete, but I was slightly nervous they weren't set deep enough (I still wanted to cover them in sand and leave 16+ inches exposed).
customer_reviews.author: Erik from California

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality horseshoes and spikes. Carry case is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not regulation!
customer_reviews.text: The stakes are not regulation size. They should be 1 inch in diameter but these are smaller. To save a couple of bucks they went cheap on the stake. Buy another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L Wright

customer_reviews.title: Work great, very strong
customer_reviews.text: I got this set because I found it on a horse shoe web site as the best recommended set for amateurs players. Most of the recreational ones seem very cheap, aren't as heavy, and may not even be medal. These feel like real horse shoes. I also like that they are MADE IN THE U.S.A. So rare these days. The posts are nice and strong. The shoes are nice in heavy. Overall, a very good set.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Like everyone else has said the stakes are way too ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad for his birthday. Like everyone else has said the stakes are way too short. Good quality shoes though.
customer_reviews.author: drums0258

customer_reviews.title: Good set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas and I didn't know anything about horseshoes at all! So, after reading good reviews on this set and not wanting to buy a cheap set, I purchased these and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Hester

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA -- and great!!
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what you would expect: heavy shoes, nicely coated, steel stakes that feel solid, etc. For the price, too, they are great equipment I think. They "feel right" when you throw them -- more importantly! Nice, American-made, product!
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Armbrust

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Other than the stakes being too short this is a great set – we took it to the beach and had a good time with it but the stakes had to be reset fairly often due to their lack of length
customer_reviews.author: Bropaul

customer_reviews.title: Quality made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and set it up last night. Set the spikes in a 6x6 block buried in the ground. Works great, solid product, shoes are forged so you don't have to worry about cheap cast shoes breaking on you.
customer_reviews.author: Abs

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well for a backyard party.
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well for a backyard party. The thin plastic case was kind of fragile for holding 6 pieces of steel. Found it tough to use to put it all away after use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: easy instructions, worked as expected and described
customer_reviews.text: Fast ship, easy instructions, worked as expected and described. It's just horseshoes. Tks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids love playing. Only negative is the carrying case halves keep separating but it is only a minor inconvenience as each grandkid likes to carry a piece.
customer_reviews.author: Plumber Dave

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: this horseshoe set is very nice. It comes in a very nice case. it is very heavy and durable. I think it will give our family years of enjoyment. I would recommend it and the price was right. Amazon shipped this item to me for free. Unbelievable, I love shopping at Amazon. I always check Amazon first for anything I'm shopping for.
customer_reviews.author: tuna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can beat my son still so these are great!
customer_reviews.author: John Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great quality metal shoes seemed to weigh the correct weight
customer_reviews.text: Great quality metal shoes seemed to weigh the correct weight. This was a big hit by the adults at a BBQ. So happy we bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa stotz

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are good but the poles are just too short and end ...
customer_reviews.text: The set is ok for the money. The shoes are good but the poles are just too short and end up moving.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: great shoes, not great pegs.
customer_reviews.text: If you're serious about horseshoes, these shoes are the real deal. The pegs on the other hand, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Arron Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good weight - nice set
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a "real" set of throwing shoes. This set is perfect for family that enjoys pitching.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle 101st

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Horse shoes are nice but stakes are way too short and constantly move. Overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: nice horseshoe set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to replace a cheaper set of iron shoes that didn't last a full day before a shoe split in half. The shoes are well balanced and the shape made for more ringers in my opinion. Would definitely recommend the set to anybody looking for a nice upgrade from the cheaper iron sets common in the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Shyababy

customer_reviews.title: Fun for hours for the 4th of July
customer_reviews.text: Fun for hours for the 4th of July. Heavy duty kit that helps you to play harder without worries of damaging.
customer_reviews.author: zmarshall81

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have not used yet but can tell that this is a well balanced, professional set of horseshoes.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Ellmore

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Steel (and Paint) Horseshoe Set
customer_reviews.text: I chose this horseshoe set based on the positive comments I read about their solid steel formation. I know they'll last a long time & help me build upper body strength. A bit of outer paint may flake away here and there but this no big deal. It's baked on in layers and is stronger underneath. I'm not worried about any rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Sheilah Anne

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor fun
customer_reviews.text: Very much appreciated gift for couple about to open a bed-and-breakfast in New Mexico. Nice heavy set.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SET FOR THE WEEKEND WARRIOR
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SET FOR THE WEEKEND WARRIOR. PROBABLY NOT FOR THE PROFESSIONAL. HAVE NOT HAD TROUBLE WITH THE PAINT COMING OFF. OF COURSE THE SHOES GETS SOME NICKS AND SCRATCHES FROM HITTING THE STAKE BUT THAT IS TO BE EXPECTED. DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Bigdog79

customer_reviews.title: Fun playing horseshoes with this set
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the horseshoe set... plus you can view an instructional DVD. We've used it several times. It's solid, well made, and we are enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Country girl

customer_reviews.title: It’s a well made product. Definitely buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made. Bought it for my son’s birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Love the horseshoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the horseshoes. We use them on the beach when we go out on the boat. Only thing we do not like is the carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. We've played many games and so far, so good. I was waiting to see how they held up before writing a review.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: All based on reviews- thanks everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Everything came in great condition, I bought this for my boyfriend and he was very impressed with this set! He wanted to start playing horseshoes, so I read reviews and thought why not?! For the price, I'm extremely happy with this. I highly recommend this for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Galaxy Chick

customer_reviews.title: Solid Material
customer_reviews.text: Strong pieces of metal. Good weight and feel like they will last a long time. Even if the paint comes off at some point, just repaint it and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Strong and consistent set of shoes. Well made and perfectly balanced.
customer_reviews.author: White17509

customer_reviews.title: Well made Set
customer_reviews.text: Sell made set of horseshoes. Shoes are balanced and throw well. Posts do rust on the top after hammering them in and being left in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Drew A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Will be able to enjoy them for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit. Seems quality and durable. Really worth the extra $.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Real Horseshoes!
customer_reviews.text: These were a great Christmas gift. I liked them because they are heavy, made of metal and substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Lynne Cory

customer_reviews.title: Good set of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these not knowing my brother had ordered me a set of the presidential edition. I decided to keep them anyway. Glad I did. When he came to visit we played with the presidential shoes for a couple days and after that time the paint had worn off to the point we had a hard time distinguishing between the shoes in dim light. Switched to these blue and gray and after several more games the paint still looks good on these. No problem at all telling which is which and since both sets are regulation I'll just keep the presidential set for a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I received this set just in time for an end of summer party. Good solid set, even though the shoes seem a little light. Everthing held up well. I like thw instructions for setting up a pro court! May do that in the future. Case is light duty, but works well to keep everything together and clean for the next event.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Stachowiak

customer_reviews.title: Great set of horseshoes
customer_reviews.text: solid, heavy metal parts and a strong plastic case for keeping them stored away easily. Very happy to have these to throw around the yard!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price but the paint chips off the shoes the first time you use them.
customer_reviews.author: khalilsc

customer_reviews.title: Good, heavy duty product
customer_reviews.text: shoes and stakes are solid, but 30" shoes would be better for the loose, sandy soil here.
customer_reviews.author: Edward L. Nowinski

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping came undamaged
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping came undamaged. Shoes are descent quality have no intention to use the stakes. Only thing was that the coating on the gray shoes was a little rough but still threw ringers. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes good, poles too short
customer_reviews.text: Poles could be longer so they don't move when at "official" hieght
customer_reviews.author: Nurg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect horse shoes, terrible stakes
customer_reviews.text: The horse shoes are perfect. They throw great, and seem like they will last for years and years. I do wish they came in different colors (not a Colts fan). However, the stakes they come with aren't worth it. They are only 2 feet (24") long, and you need 12-15" out of the ground. Meaning, that there is only 12"-9" holding the stake in the ground. When you are throwing heavy, well made shoes at the stakes they move, a lot. So.... do yourself a favor and buy the shoes only & go buy two(2) 3 foot 3/4" from your local metal yard.
customer_reviews.author: RogerThat

customer_reviews.title: Horeshoes
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, love how well made they are.would reorder again
customer_reviews.author: Renee Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little square feeling in my opinion but they are well built and strong
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Eiland

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these for a father's day gift, the ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a father's day gift, the horse shoes seem decent, but the case is cheaply made, and will not last to long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WhooHoo
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. We actually have state champion & world champion horseshoe players in our community. We play all the time. These are wonderful shoes. Gordans, Diamonds & Americans.... Great shoes. These were a great price & a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Not well made and very cheap. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Big Joe

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This set comes with every thing you need to play and can be set up and ready in a couple of minutes. It even comes with a set of rules for those people who don't quite remember but will not agree until they see it in print. Good product, well made, priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S

customer_reviews.title: Good horseshoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying these! I was worried they was going to be cheap. They are pretty good quality. The stakes could be a little longer, but other than that, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap casing.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Cheap flimsy case. It was delivered to my front door busted open all over the place, the case was broken.
customer_reviews.author: David kirby

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent set, but I have seen better quality shoes on similar priced sets.
customer_reviews.author: N. Spears

customer_reviews.title: Not too Bad!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this set an 7.5 (which is really good nowadays) out of a 10... The posts should be longer...
customer_reviews.author: John M....

customer_reviews.title: Nice set. purchased for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. purchased for Christmas. the poles are a bit short, you would not be able to set them in concrete. The shoes are nice!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product.
customer_reviews.text: Horse shoes were to specifications and arrived exactly on time.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Poehlman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product, horse shoes are on point. Easy to one flip and ring TF outta some shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Szuch

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This set is made right and haven't had any problems such as broken shoe's. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.E

customer_reviews.title: good set
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes, well made quality steel. One concern is that the stakes need to be longer. If your sand pit is very deep, you need longer stakes.
customer_reviews.author: cfast

customer_reviews.title: Good quality horseshoe set
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a set of horseshoes for several years. We are having a family reunion in August. So I thought it would be the perfect time to purchase this set. I set up the horseshoes in my back yard and was very happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell W. Isebrand

product_meta.title: St. Pierre American Professional Series Horseshoes Complete Set: Includes 4 Horseshoes, 24-inch Solid Steel Stakes, Official Rulebook, and Black Plastic Tote
product_meta.description: Enjoy a competitive day out with the St. Pierre American Professional Horseshoes set. Designed by a World Champion horseshoe pitcher and made in the USA, these solid steel horseshoes feature a trademarked design that put them a cut above the rest. These NHPA-approved horseshoes have more weight forged in the tips to give the pitcher better balance and control. It also has longer tips, a tapered leading edge allowing the shoes to slide into the stakes and a ringer breaker to rotate the shoe. Pitch like the pros with the finger positioner which helps beginners hold the shoe properly. This complete set comes with 4 forged steel American horseshoes (Blue and Red), 2 solid steel stakes (24 inches long), a copy of the official rulebook, and a handy black plastic tote. Order yours from Dazadi and enjoy 60 days manufacturer warranty!
feature_bullets: FREE ACCESSORIES AND SHIPPING - The complete set includes the official rulebook and a black plastic tote for carrying the set on top of the 60-day manufacturer warranty. Order from Dazadi and youll also get FREE shipping.

PACKED WITH AWESOME FEATURES - These NHPA-approved horseshoes have more weight forged into the toe calks (tips) to improve balance and control as well as a tapered leading edge so the shoes can slide into the stake easily.

PITCH LIKE THE PROS - This world class horseshoe design has longer tips to grab the stake and a ringer breaker to rotate the shoe. Whats more, it has a finger positioner so you can hold it like the pros.
RUGGED AND DURABLE - 4 forged steel American horseshoes (Blue and Gray) and 2 solid steel 24-inch stakes are built to withstand even the harshest weather conditions.
WORLD CLASS DESIGN - Made in the USA and designed by a World Champion Horseshoe pitcher, this horseshoes unique shape places it a cut above the rest.
